subject: LUCEDALE 945 PM CDT FRI APR 13 2007 .
body:
KLAWOCK 9 PM ADT FRI APR 13 2007 . MOSTLY CLOUDY 
SKIES WITH SCATTERED SHOWERS THROUGH 3 AM.
ACROSS COASTAL AND SOUTHWEST ALABAMA AROUND MID 
DAY.
This file is usually updated about every two 
minutes. KAKE 1200 AM ADT SAT APR 14 2007 . MOSTLY CLOUDY SKIES WITH SHOWERS THROUGH 
3 AM.
MOSTLY CLOUDY SKIES WITH SCATTERED SHOWERS THROUGH 
3 AM. STAY TUNED TO NOAA WEATHER RADIO AND YOUR LOCAL BROADCAST NEWS MEDIA FOR THE 
LATEST FORECAST INFORMATION REGARDING THE UPCOMING PERIOD OF SEVERE 
WEATHER.
THERE IS A MODERATE RISK OF SEVERE STORMS SATURDAY 
ALONG THE CENTRAL GULF COAST REGION.
SOUTH WIND 10 TO 15 MPH. KLAWOCK 9 PM ADT FRI APR 
13 2007 . IN PARTICULARLY MARION. SHOWERS HAVE BEEN LIMITED TO THE HIGHER ELEVATIONS 
AROUND THE PORT AND POINTS SOUTH. PARTLY TO MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SCATTERED RAIN 
SHOWERS.
PARTLY TO MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SCATTERED RAIN 
SHOWERS.
SOUTH WIND AROUND 10 MPH.
